segments.text: May and Danny have already grown up .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can still remember our first date .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look at that big tree over there .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , oh my god ! It's still there . We have our first date right on there .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you know that I fell in love with you at the first sight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You were dull at that time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But you agreed to go out with me at last .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I can't believe this for it's been 20 years since we got married .
segments.speaker: S1
